name: Bart the Lover
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Jon Vitti
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: After Mrs. Krabappel gives Bart a month of detention, he gets his revenge by responding to her newspaper singles ad. Meanwhile, Marge suggests Homer to start a swear jar to stop him cursing.
